title: Player Behaviour Warnings or Something?
body:
So I've had two accounts permabanned, for perfectly reasonable reasons, i.e. that I am (was?) toxic. The first account I just wanted to  see how toxic I could become (Riot told me stuff like "only 5% of players are this bad " etc), and the second account I got permabanned all of a sudden for a string of games where I was foul mouthed and ill-behaved.

I would like to think that I am not foul mouthed all of the time; and I do make an effort not to be nowadays. Recently I had a discussion with two other players who were in one of my teams who also had issues trying to be non-toxic, one of whom was banned 8 times and the other 4. I think lots of players do make a real effort to reform; I've only been toxic in one out of maybe my last 20 games, where I just lost it. Aside from that I try to control myself and be civil.

Following up this line of thinking, I think it would really help people like myself who are reforming if Riot could have more obvious reminders of the need to be civil. I don't want to be toxic, and I don't want to be permabanned, but sometimes your emotions can get the better of you. 

If there were more ways that players could be warned and reminded of proper behaviours I think many people would appreciate it. I believe there used to be a function which would tell you when you had been reported for something by other Players. That feature no longer seems to be in effect. I would love for that to come back and for other things like that to be implemented. (I believe it was something along the lines of "You have recently been reported for Verbal Abuse. We know that [insert something about the game being intense or something I don't remember] but please remember to [be a nice person or something]").

It would really help me and players like me, and just the community in general, in my opinion, if features like this were brought back, or made possible. Knowing that you have been reported prompts introspection or awareness of one's behaviour. 

Thanks Riot



TL;DR  -  would appreciate support for reform(ed)(ing) players in the form of notifications and reminders

replies.body: This is actually really relatable. i try not to be toxic in my games but sometimes i can't help myself. i haven't ever recieved a ban but im positive that i've been reported numerous times. I think your right in saying that there should be some kind of warning system or a reminder system to try and get players to stop being toxic. I know you can't expect this to make everyone non toxic but i feel like it would help. Rather than getting a straight ban out of nowhere without any warning.
